title: error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/middle/region.rs:377:32: no enclosing scope for id 6

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust struct Bug { a: A } fn main() { } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.58.0 (02072b482 2022-01-11) rustc 1.59.0-beta.1 (7c0b25092 2022-01-13) rustc 1.60.0-nightly (22e491ac7 2022-01-13) ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/middle/region.rs:377:32: no enclosing scope for id 6 ```
